meanings.definition: One of the twelve chief followers of Jesus Christ.
meanings.sent1: The apostles spread the teachings of Jesus.
meanings.sent2: The apostles were devoted to following Jesus.
meanings.sent3: The apostles joked about who was the best fisherman among them.
meanings.sent4: She was like an apostle of kindness, always helping others.
meanings.sent5: The image of the apostles walking with Jesus stayed in their minds.

meanings.definition: A pioneer of any reform movement.
meanings.sent1: As an apostle of change, she led the reform movement.
meanings.sent2: The apostles of equality fought for justice.
meanings.sent3: The apostle of innovation always had new ideas.
meanings.sent4: He was an apostle of progress, pushing for positive change.
meanings.sent5: The apostle of freedom inspired others to stand up for their rights.

meanings.definition: A vigorous and pioneering advocate or supporter of a particular cause.
meanings.sent1: She was an apostle of environmental conservation.
meanings.sent2: The apostles of education worked tirelessly for better schools.
meanings.sent3: The apostle of laughter brought joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent4: He was an apostle of peace in a world filled with conflict.
meanings.sent5: The apostle of love spread kindness wherever she went.
